- **Efficiency Tip of the Day ** (2 min) – Julie
  - Google Docs Menu > Add-ons > Search: Markdown > Install 
  - I installed “Docs to Markdown”
  - To use: Highlight text > Add-ons > Docs to Markdown > Convert > paste into GitHub or elsewhere!
